description: Try our easy to follow Quick Singapore Noodles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Quick Singapore Noodles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add extra oil to pan, mix curry powder with 3 teaspoons of water to make a paste; add to pan. Add cooked noodles. Stir-fry until thoroughly combined. Add prawns, onion and capsicum mixture, omelette strips and bean sprouts, season the mixture with soy sauce. Stir-fry for 4-5 minutes until the noodles are warmed. Serve with coriander and a squeeze of lemon if desired.
